mapper.select: SELECT CART_NO, SEED_NO, COUNT, SEED_IMG_PATH, SEED_NAME, SEED_PRICE FROM "CART" JOIN "SEED" USING(SEED_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE "CART" SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND SEED_NO = (SELECT SEED_NO FROM "SEED" WHERE SEED_NAME = #{seedName})
UPDATE "CART" SET COUNT = COUNT + -1 WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND SEED_NO = (SELECT SEED_NO FROM "SEED" WHERE SEED_NAME = #{seedName})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM "CART" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND SEED_NO = (SELECT SEED_NO FROM "SEED" WHERE SEED_NAME = #{seedName})
